ambitionBoxData.Title: KODECORP TECHNOLOGY SOLUTIONS Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Greetings From Kode Corp Technologies


Currently we have an opening for Mobile App Developer who have atleast 5+ years of experience in Flutter development. And Looking for the immediate joiners, the payment will be excited therefore, it will be negotiable and we can discuss in the technical interview itself

Please go through the detailed JD as follows and if interested, please share your updated resume along with the following details:


Name:

Total Exp:

Rel Exp in Flutter:

C.CTC:

E.CTC:



Mobile Developers (4 hrs minimum every day, daily scrum 30 mins)

Responsibilities:

1. Design, develop, and maintain cross-platform mobile features using Flutter.

2. Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.

3. Collaborate with designers, product managers, and back-end engineers to deliver high-quality features.

4. Develop expertise in both iOS and Android development using Flutter for a unified codebase.

5. Implement unit and integration tests for comprehensive application coverage.

6. Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.

7. Contribute to the development and maintenance of the CI/CD pipeline using tools like Jenkins, Fastlane, or CircleCI.

8. Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Flutter and mobile development best practices.

Qualifications:

1. Proven experience building cross-platform mobile applications with Flutter (4+ years).

2. Strong understanding of object-oriented programming concepts.

3. Proficiency in Dart programming language.

4. Proficiency in SQLite, Asynchronous programming

5. Proficiency in using Mapping software like Google Maps and Apple Maps

6. Experience using device Camera SDKs

7. Experience with building native UI components for iOS and Android using Flutter.

8. Experience with unit and integration testing frameworks for Flutter (e.g., Mockito, TestFlutter).

9. Experience with CI/CD tools and methodologies (e.g., Jenkins, Fastlane, CircleCI).

10. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

11. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

12. A passion for mobile development and a strong desire to learn new technologies.

13. Must have experience with GCP

14. Must have app deployment experience to Google Store and Apple Store

title: Senior iOS & Android Developer (Kotlin & Swift)
jobDescription:
Greetings and thank you for visiting our job post.

Supercoder is an AI-powered career development platform to connect developers around the world to remote job opportunities with competitive payment.


We are looking for Senior APP Developer (Kotlin and Swift) position with details as below:


Type of role: 100% Full-time remote


Company Overview:

  • Our company, founded by a team of five experts with extensive experience in medical device R&D in 2017, is a rapidly growing startup recognized worldwide. We are dedicated to revolutionizing the field of medical devices by incorporating cutting-edge electroceutical technology, tissue engineering, and neural modulation techniques to address chronic and limited treatment options for various medical conditions.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Designing, developing, and maintaining various mobile apps
  • Analyzing user requirements to provide optimal solutions
  • Improving app functionality and performance using programming languages
  • Implementing measures to maintain app security and stability

Requirements:

  • 3-7 years of experience in app development
  • Specialized knowledge of Android
  • Excellent understanding of programming languages (Java, Kotlin, etc.)
  • Continuous interest and willingness to learn new technologies and trends
  • Good experience with IOS, Swift

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with Bluetooth technology
  • Experience in the healthcare industry
  • Experience developing two native apps from a-z
